Summaries.eng: Petit Seka is a ten-episode mini-anime series featuring characters from the mobile game 'Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE!'

Leo/need attend band practice in the "SEKAI" where Hatsune Miku and the other VIRTUAL SINGERs live. On their way home after practice, Ichika and the others get hungry, so they decide to stop somewhere first...!
Summaries.jpn:
初音ミク達バーチャル・シンガーのいる「セカイ」で
バンドの練習をするLeo/needのメンバー。
練習帰りにお腹が空いた一歌達が寄ったのは……。

Summaries.eng: Phoenix Wonderland is under attack by the mysterious devil Emu! To protect the peace of Phoenix Wonderland, our hero, Pegasus the Shining, stands together with Professor Ruidouji and Neneko. Nenenger V, let's move out!
Summaries.jpn:
フェニックスワンダーランドに怪人エムゥの魔の手が迫る！
ランドの平和を守る為、類道寺博士、寧々子と共に立ち上がる
我らがヒーロー、ペガサス・ザ・シャイニング。
ネネンガーＶで発進だ！

Summaries.eng: Together with her friends, Minori is doing her best with practices every day, but the road to become an idol is an endlessly tough one. Through Airi's hard trainings, Minori is trying to acquire her own brilliance. What kind of tomorrow will it be for MORE MORE JUMP!?
Summaries.jpn:
日々仲間との練習に励むみのりであったが、アイドルへの道は果てしなく厳しいものであった。
愛莉のスパルタ猛特訓によりキラキラを獲得しようとするみのり。MORE MORE JUMP！の明日はどっちだ。

Summaries.eng:
"1000 Ways To Not Be Nervous"
It was this easy! There's a method for you! Must Read!
A practical manual on how to handle all types of everyday situations!
If you read this, you too can radiate confidence!
Summaries.jpn:
「緊張しない為の１０００の方法」
こんなに簡単だったんだ！あなたにあった方法が必ず見つかる必読の一冊！
様々な状況に対応できる逆引きシチュエーション別実践マニュアル。
これを読めばあなたも肝っ玉！

Summaries.eng: Those who stay up until 25:00 to watch "Petit SEKAI" probably already knew this, but 25:00 is truly a fascinating period of time. Watching anime on real-time, gourmet food photos that suddenly appear on your SNS timeline, and cozy late-night radio broadcasts. Mizuki who was fascinated by the magic of 25:00 went and proposed something to the other members of 25-ji...
Saki's hobby is: watching fashion and make-up videos. But there's no way that she could be satisfied just by watching, which is why she's looking for a chance to show off her technique.

Titles.jpn: 時空を超えてわんだほーい！

Summaries.eng: Ding-Dong-Ding-Dong ♪ Calling the following students: Tenma Tsukasa from Class 2-A, Kamishiro Rui from Class 2-B. Please come to the staff room immediately. We have a few questions regarding the large personal belonging you have left behind on the school's rooftop. Ding-Dong-Ding-Dong ♪

Titles.eng: Let's Go Viral! MORE MORE JUMP!

Summaries.eng: We want more people to see our idol activities!" With that in mind, MORE MORE JUMP! started to broadcast their activities on a daily basis. However, the number of views they got didn't increase as expected. During this situation, what Airi suggested was...!
